title: First game load time longer than normal
body: So about 3 months ago my loading screen ONLY for my FIRST game of the day is incredibly noticeably longer than every game afterwards. It's weird it wasn't like this before I tried running the repair option it didn't work its really annoying cuz i've lost lp due to team doing /remake since i forget my first game is broken.

replies.body:
You may have missing system permissions that slow down the client from loading assets from the League directory the first time. There are a number of steps inside our [permissions guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) that may help resolve this issue, so I recommend starting there.

Let me know if this issue persists.
